item.title: LOGITECH INTERNATIONAL SA 10-K
item.description: LOGITECH INTERNATIONAL SA, which is in the Computer Peripheral Equipment, Nec [3577] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 12, 2021 had 37776 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2021 - 482 instances fiscal - 340 instances 2020 - 303 instances products - 301 instances company - 300 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
